Articles.Content:
Hello all

I just switched from the demo to the latest full version. Things got mistrust. Around 15km in safe and sound flight my kerbonauts disappear/die. Is there a new hatch I am supposed to close. Or is this a bug. I probably lost a dozen brace men in trying to figure this out.

Please help my incompetence and save green lives!
I heard there was a bug somewhere that causes that. At any rate welcome to the forums!
Do have mods installed? There's one that causes this, though I don't remember which.

I was using the AR version only added a few flags and the USSR components, but after the bug occurred the first time.

I wipe the installation and installed the version 0.23.0.395 and know my little crew men stay alive.

Thank you for pointing me in the right direction!

I was using the ARM version with a few additional flags and USSR components.

I wiped that and reinstalled without ARM , now 0.23.0.395 works fine

Thanks for pointing me in the right direction.
I read about this same problem a few days ago. It is caused by the soviet pack apparently.

Bobcat mod packs add the ECLSS life support mod to the game.

To stop this from happening you just go into the folder where that says ECLSS (I think that's the folders names)
Glad the bug is gone now, and welcome to the forums!
